title: 1812-G
statement: G. Colour Visiontime limit per test1 secondmemory limit per test256 megabytesinputstandard inputoutputstandard outputExampleInput11RROutputYES

processed.result: Given a string consisting of the characters 'R', 'O', and ' ', determine if the string can be rearranged to form a valid sequence. A valid sequence is defined as a string where all 'R' characters appear before all 'O' characters.
Given a string, determine if it can be rearranged to form a palindrome.
